name: Sentry Knight Tactics
description: Sentry Knight Tactics is a charming, cute action-strategy RPG adventure. Set in a land under siege by a transdimensional evil, you command your team of powerful heroes through various realms as you slaughter enemy hordes, complete quests, upgrade your gear and save the world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD Equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD Equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX or AMD Equivalent Storage: 200 MB available space
